content: this pattern can be found for free on my blog here 1 the ad-free print-friendly pdf is available on etsy here 2 made with 2 scheepjes whirls in any colors of your choice and worked without cutting or carrying the yarn throughout this shawl is rhythmic to create and fun to wear bonus 4 ends to weave the pattern includes ~thoroughly tested written pattern ~stitch abbreviations us terms special stitches and notes sections ~diagram of shawl dimensions pdf only dimensions sample shawl 27 68 5cm wide at base x 72 183cm long skill level easy stitches used single_crochet double_crochet 5dctog detailed in pattern slip_stitch when you purchase $16 50 worth of patterns enter code esave3 at checkout on etsy 3 for a $3 savings finished items may be sold i just ask that you give credit to me susan carlson at feltedbutton com for the pattern keep in the button loop facebook 4 pinterest 5 feltedbutton com 6 instagram @feltedbutton 1 https //www feltedbutton com/2019/03/duo-shawl-free-crochet-pattern html 2 https //www etsy com/listing/690853879/crochet-pattern-duo-shawl-scarf-wrap 3 https //www etsy com/shop/feltedbutton 4 https //facebook com/feltedbutton 5 https //www pinterest com/feltedbutton/ 6 feltedbutton com
